attributes.action: refurbish Hambrook Primary School in order to provide safe and fit for purpose Hall, classroom and toilet facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hambrook Primary School Hall is no longer safe to hold whole school: assemblies, collective worship, sports, wet weather provision and fundraising events. Despite recommendations by Ofsted to improve the school's infrastructure, money has not been made available by the appropriate authorities.
